DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study - determine supervise exercise intervention improve metabolic parameter type 2 diabetes patient - investigate kind intervention ( strength endurance training versus combine strength endurance training rehabilitation exercise intervention ) effective improve metabolic parameter patient type 2 diabetes - ass exercise intervention induce high effect metabolic rate cardiac pulmonary capacity - investigate kind intervention include high effect long term persistence positive effect
